item.title: Report X-2024120704
item.description:
Report X-2024120704

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-16T12:32:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-05
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKER WAS CALLED INTO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER USED THE DECSION TREE AND LANDED ON THE FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE PAGE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE GUIDLINES IN THE RESPONSE SHEET TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL AND BROUGHT LEAKER BACK TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
